lyrics:

verse tyga
unreal to a close eye

no time when the tick is down
my rolex dial don’t mean shit now it’s just another pay cut

uh casino’s cnotes and chips like frito’s

like gimme those still buy em though

city national bank evolve into shape
of a dollar then i duplicate

cause soon as yall fell well you fell with em
